abstract: YouTube and Ning, which depend heavily on user-generated content, are cracking down on sexually explicit material on their sites.
snippet: YouTube and Ning, which depend heavily on user-generated content, are cracking down on sexually explicit material on their sites.
lead_paragraph: A quick Google search for “sex” returns a whopping 67 million pages. A search for “porn” turns up more than 18 million pages.

headline.main: YouTube and Ning Just Say No to Sex
